title: CS Competency Enhancement: Reflective Iterative Approach to University Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can identify and describe at least three issues encountered in their mathematics instructional design process through reflective journaling conducted three or more times
Participants can develop an action plan to apply solutions derived from reflective analysis—based on peer feedback and instructional developer support—to actual lecture design
Participants can analyze learner response data from real-time online environments when delivering mathematics concepts and derive at least two adjustment points for improving subsequent lectures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
